title: No more loose taxonomies or dirty data
description: In 2024, I told you the generalist times were over and that user needs models would define success in media. In 2025, I challenged you to find a new news user need outside the “know-understand-feel-do” framework (still waiting, by the way). In 2026, I’m telling you that understanding user needs is only half the battle...
